scene: Teen Byte sits at the wooden desk in mid-afternoon, gangly limbs radiating restless energy after hours without commits, head turned to gaze intently out the Chicago window while one hand rests near the food bowl in subtle hunger awareness

subjects.description: Byte in teen stage with gangly elongated limbs, big expressive eyes, and slightly awkward proportions
subjects.action: sitting with body facing desk but head turned toward window, one hand resting near food bowl showing subtle hunger at 56% satiety

subjects.description: anchor environment: wooden desk with oversized silver laptop, Chicago skyline visible through window
subjects.position: desk center stage, window behind left
subjects.action: static environment with laptop screen glow

style: pixel art, clean 2D forms, dithered shading, readable silhouette
lighting: bright warm mid-afternoon sun streaming through window, stronger than early afternoon, casting clearer shadows
mood: ecstatic but restless, anticipatory energy, hopeful waiting
background: trophy shelf above desk with exactly one golden trophy on left and one green plant on right, food bowl on floor to the right with clear spacing
composition: Byte centered at desk, window visible to the left showing Chicago skyline in afternoon light, trophy shelf mounted on wall above
